title: Gambler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to VFR at any point during the day when at least one vote for a player has been cast. If you do, the current vote will be cancelled, a completely random player will be hanged, and the day will immediately end. You may only VFR thrice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The VFR target is rolled twice, one of them is picked at random, but non-townies are prioritized.
- The third VFR target is rolled thrice, applying the same from above.
- You have Basic defense after using VFR.
